name: Firesphere
description:
Single handedly take down an armada of space cruisers, blast as many fighters as you can and compete with yourself on your local highscore leaderboard.

  • Game by Marcus Karåker (@MarcusKaraker)
  • Music and Audio by Erik Gudmundson (@ErikG39311721)
Controls

Aim - "Mouse Cursor"
Shoot - "Left Mouse Button"
Shield - "Right Mouse Button"
Thrust - "Left Shift"
Weapon Swap - "Mouse Scroll Wheel" or "Number keys"
